title: 089 - Give Rick Moranis A Break
description: On today's show, the guys dive right into the Pod FOD and discuss many different things including Rick Moranis deserving a break, how Bruce Lee's family may have been cursed, Adam Sandler's new Halloween movie, elephant seals showing up on crosswalks in suburban neighborhoods, how cows react when people milk them, what kind of plans Zito has for his birthday, Billy Tubes potentially becoming an e-gaming superstar, and much more. Plus Nick has some new Friday Bangerz to help send you into a fantastic weekend. Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow for a chance to be entered into a $100,000 giveaway as we have reached over 1 million subscribers, and keep sending your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all for listening, stay safe this weekend, and enjoy.
